User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

Set the src of an image to a larger image using JS while the width of that image is set in CSS. See this JSfiddle for a test case: http://jsfiddle.net/kB5JM/6/


Actual results:

The image doesn't get updated until you trigger a redraw(?) by scrolling, unfocusing the tab, etc.


Expected results:

The image should have been updated.
